parameter.name: useConfiguredStreams
parameter.description: Limit QC determination to processed data streams which are defined in global bindings with detecLocid and detecStream.

parameter.name: use3Components
parameter.description: If useConfiguredStreams is true then this parameter decides whether to use only the vertical component (default) or all three components. The 3 components are collected from the inventory according to channel orientation. If that is not possible then the fixed components N and E will be used.

parameter.name: streamMask
parameter.description:
If useConfiguredStreams == False then load (from inventory) only those streams, matching the streamMask
RegEx e.g. "^(NET1|NET2)\.(STA1|STA2|STA3)\.(LOC)\.((BH)|(LH)|(HH))Z$"
RegEx e.g. "^(.+)\.(.+)\.(.*)\.(.+)Z$"
streamMask = "^(.+)\.(.+)\.(.*)\.(BHZ)$"

parameter.name: dbLookBack
parameter.description: Database look up for past entries not older than x days (to determine the last QC parameter calculated).

parameter.name: reportInterval
parameter.description: Interval for sending the report messages in seconds.

parameter.name: alertInterval
parameter.description: Interval for checking the alert thresholds in seconds.

parameter.name: staBufferLength
parameter.description: Short Term Average (STA) buffer length in seconds.

parameter.name: ltaBufferLength
parameter.description: Long Term Average (LTA) buffer length in seconds.

parameter.name: timeout
parameter.description: Generate a report message in case no data is received since timeout in seconds.

parameter.name: thresholds
parameter.description: Alert thresholds in percent, single value [or list 25,50,75 ... not yet implemented].

option.description: Do not use the database at all
